sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_gauge_counts"><sys_gauge_counts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><gauge_id display_value="Additional Metrics">53d6e3231f3121006d691b220e8b70e0</gauge_id><image/><name>OrchCoreTransactionLast30Days</name><omit_line>false</omit_line><order/><override_style/><query/><script>SNC.UsageAnalyticsScriptUtils.getCount('OrchCoreTransactionLast30Days', 'Orchestration Core transactions only executed in the last 30 days (Does not include today)');</script><short_description>Orchestration Core transactions only executed in the last 30 days (Does not incl</short_description><sys_class_name>sys_gauge_counts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-07-20 00:00:21</sys_created_on><sys_id>f1478edfdb975f405c025a6adc961954</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OrchCoreTransactionLast30Days</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SP - Process Flow" source="x_pisn_sp_procflow">ac2251abdb5c934085895845dc9619fe</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SP - Process Flow">ac2251abdb5c934085895845dc9619fe</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_gauge_counts_f1478edfdb975f405c025a6adc961954</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-07-20 00:00:21</sys_updated_on><tablename>OrchCoreTransactionLast30Days</tablename><use_script>true</use_script></sys_gauge_counts></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b7259dabdbd493405c025a6adc96197c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_pisn_sp_procflow.ProcessFlow</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ProcessFlow</name><script><![CDATA[var ProcessFlow = Class.create();
ProcessFlow.prototype = {
    initialize: function(taskGR) {
		this.taskGR = taskGR;
    },

	loadStagesForTask: function(taskGR) {
		taskGR = taskGR || this.taskGR;
		var stages = [];

		var processFlowGR = this.getProcessFlowGR(taskGR);

		var foundCurrent = false;

		while (processFlowGR.next()) {
			var stageData = {
				sys_id: processFlowGR.getUniqueValue(),
				value: processFlowGR.name.toString(),
				label: processFlowGR.label.getDisplayValue(),
				description: processFlowGR.description.getDisplayValue()
			};

			var isCurrent = GlideFilter.checkRecord(taskGR, processFlowGR.condition.toString());

			if (isCurrent) {
				stageData.state = 'current';
				foundCurrent = true;
			} else if (foundCurrent) {
				stageData.state = 'future';
			} else {
				stageData.state = 'past';
			}

			stages.push(stageData);
		}

		// If we never saw a "current" stage, all stages will be marked as "past", in this case, go and flip them all to "future"
		var numberOfPastStages = stages.filter(function(stage) { return stage.state == 'past'; }).length;
		var areAllInPast = stages.length == numberOfPastStages;

		if (areAllInPast) {
			stages = stages.map(function(stage) {
				stage.state = 'future';
				return stage;
			});
		}

		return stages;
	},

	getProcessFlowGR: function(taskGR) {
		var processFlowGR = new GlideRecord('sys_process_flow');
		processFlowGR.addQuery('table', taskGR.getRecordClassName());
		processFlowGR.addQuery('active', true);
		processFlowGR.orderBy('order');
		processFlowGR.query();

		return processFlowGR;
	},

	toObject: function() {
		return {
			table: this.taskGR.getRecordClassName(),
			sys_id: this.taskGR.getUniqueValue(),
			stages: this.loadStagesForTask()
		};
	},

    type: 'ProcessFlow'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>chris.hann</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-02-21 13:58:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>b7259dabdbd493405c025a6adc96197c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ProcessFlow</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SP - Process Flow" source="x_pisn_sp_procflow">ac2251abdb5c934085895845dc9619fe</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SP - Process Flow">ac2251abdb5c934085895845dc9619fe</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b7259dabdbd493405c025a6adc96197c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>chris.hann</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-02-22 11:17:14</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_3c62d1abdb5c934085895845dc96191b
sys_update_xml.payload: custom 0; }; spUtil.recordWatch($scope, c.data.table, 'sys_id=' + c.data.sys_id, function() { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>c// Default Colors $x-pisn-sp-procflow-color: $text-default !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-bg: darken($body-bg, 5%) !default; // "Current Stage" Colors $x-pisn-sp-procflow-current-bg: $brand-primary !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-current-color: lighten($x-pisn-sp-procflow-current-bg, 45%) !default; // "Past Stage" Colors $x-pisn-sp-procflow-past-color: lighten($x-pisn-sp-procflow-current-bg, 45%) !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-past-bg: lighten($x-pisn-sp-procflow-current-bg, 30%) !default; // "Future Stage" Colors $x-pisn-sp-procflow-future-color: lighten($x-pisn-sp-procflow-color, 10%) !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-future-bg: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-bg !default; // Color of border between Flow Stages $x-pisn-sp-procflow-border-color: $body-bg !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-tranistion-time: 0.5s !default; // Sizing $x-pisn-sp-procflow-border-radius: $border-radius-base !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-height: $line-height-computed * 2 !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-font-size: $font-size-small !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-chevron-height: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-height / 2 !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-chevron-width: 16px !default; @media (max-width: 768px) { .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow-hide { display: none; } } .x-pisn-sp-procflow__container { display: flex; align-items: stretch; width: 100%; border-radius: 4px; height: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-height; font-size: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-font-size; overflow: hidden; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow__stage { position: relative; display: flex; flex: 1 1; background: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-bg; color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-color; justify-content: center; align-items: center; padding-left: 1ex; padding-right: 1ex; transition: background-color $x-pisn-sp-procflow-tranistion-time, color $x-pisn-sp-procflow-tranistion-time; &::before { position: absolute; display: block; border: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-chevron-height solid $x-pisn-sp-procflow-bg; border-left: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-chevron-width solid $x-pisn-sp-procflow-border-color; border-right: 0; top: -2px; bottom: -2px; z-index: 9; content: ''; left: -($x-pisn-sp-procflow-chevron-width / 2); transition: border-color $x-pisn-sp-procflow-tranistion-time; } &::after { position: absolute; display: block; border: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-chevron-height solid transparent; border-left: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-chevron-width solid $x-pisn-sp-procflow-bg; border-right: 0; top: -2px; bottom: -2px; z-index: 10; content: ''; right: -($x-pisn-sp-procflow-chevron-width / 2) + 1px; transition: border-color $x-pisn-sp-procflow-tranistion-time; } } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow__stage:first-of-type { border-top-left-radius: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-border-radius; border-bottom-left-radius: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-border-radius; &::before { display: none; } } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow__stage:last-of-type { border-top-right-radius: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-border-radius; border-bottom-right-radius: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-border-radius; &::after { display: none; } } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow__stage--current { color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-current-color; background-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-current-bg; &:after { border-left-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-current-bg; } &:before { border-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-current-bg; border-left-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-border-color; } } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow__stage--past { color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-past-color; background-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-past-bg; &:before { border-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-past-bg; border-left-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-border-color; } &:after { border-left-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-past-bg; } } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow__stage--future { color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-future-color; background-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-future-bg; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow__label { margin-left: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-chevron-width; margin-right: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-chevron-width; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow__stage--has-icon { .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow__label { padding-right: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-font-size; } } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-flow__icon { position: absolute; right: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-font-size; } sp_instance{ "options": { "table": "idea", "sys_id": "fe6703ebdb14d3405c025a6adc9619de", "show_icons": true } }truex-pisn-sp-procflow-chevronsfalsePI - Process Flow[{"name":"table","section":"other","default_value":"","label":"Table","type":"string"},{"hint":"Sys ID of the Task record","name":"sys_id","section":"other","default_value":"","label":"Sys ID","type":"string"},{"name":"show_icons","section":"other","default_value":"true","label":"Show icons","type":"boolean"},{"name":"only_desktop","section":"other","default_value":"false","label":"Only Desktop","type":"boolean"}]falsesnc_external,snc_internalfalsesp_widgetchris.hann2018-02-21 11:39:233c62d1abdb5c934085895845dc96191b329PI - Process Flowac2251abdb5c934085895845dc9619feac2251abdb5c934085895845dc9619fesp_widget_3c62d1abdb5c934085895845dc96191bchris.hann2018-07-30 06:44:37

sys_update_xml.payload: custom 0; }; spUtil.recordWatch($scope, c.data.table, 'sys_id=' + c.data.sys_id, function() { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>c// Default Colors $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-color: $text-color !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-bg: $brand-primary !default; // "Current Stage" Colors $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-current-color: lighten( $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-bg, 95% ) !default; // "Past Stage" Colors $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-past-color: lighten( $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-bg, 45% ) !default; // "Future Stage" Colors $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-future-color: lighten( $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-bg, 45% ) !default; // Color of separator between Flow Stages $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-separator-color: $body-bg !default; // Sizing $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-height: $line-height-computed * 2 !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-font-size: $font-size-small !default; $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-border-radius: 15px; .x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-flow__breadcrumb { color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-separator-color; margin-right: 8px; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite__container { display: flex; align-items: stretch; justify-content: center; width: 100%; border-radius: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-border-radius; height: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-height; font-size: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-font-size; letter-spacing: -0.2px; overflow: hidden; background-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-bg; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-flow__stage { position: relative; display: flex; background-color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-bg; color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-color; justify-content: center; align-items: center; padding-left: 1ex; padding-right: 1ex; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-flow__stage:first-of-type { border-top-left-radius: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-border-radius; border-bottom-left-radius: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-border-radius; padding-left: 10px; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-flow__stage:last-of-type { border-top-right-radius: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-border-radius; border-bottom-right-radius: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-border-radius; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-flow__stage--current { color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-current-color; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-flow__stage--past { color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-past-color; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-flow__stage--future { color: $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-future-color; } .x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-flow__arrow-down { position: absolute; bottom: 0px; left: 0px; z-index: 2; width: 0; height: 0; border-left: 7px solid transparent; border-right: 7px solid transparent; border-top: 6px solid $x-pisn-sp-procflow-lite-bg; } sp_instance{ "options": { "table": "idea", "sys_id": "fe6703ebdb14d3405c025a6adc9619de", "show_icons": true } }truex-pisn-sp-procflow-litefalsePI - Process Flow Lite[{"name":"table","section":"other","default_value":"","label":"Table","type":"string"},{"hint":"Sys ID of the Task record","name":"sys_id","section":"other","default_value":"","label":"Sys ID","type":"string"},{"name":"show_icons","section":"other","default_value":"true","label":"Show icons","type":"boolean"},{"name":"show_arrow","section":"other","default_value":"false","label":"Show Arrow","type":"boolean"}]falsesnc_external,snc_internalfalsesp_widgetfabio.petito2018-07-03 16:50:24bb6b8a4edb439b0085895845dc96191738PI - Process Flow Liteac2251abdb5c934085895845dc9619feac2251abdb5c934085895845dc9619fesp_widget_bb6b8a4edb439b0085895845dc961917chris.hann2018-07-30 06:45:15
